title: Start your financial year by investing intelligently with Bajaj Finance Fixed Deposit - Moneycontrol
content: Start your financial year by investing intelligently with Bajaj Finance Fixed Deposit  Moneycontrol
description: Bajaj Finance FD offers one of the highest FD rates, up to 6.80% p.a. for citizens aged below 60 and up to 7.05% p.a. for senior citizens.
